Where is this water coming from?? Why are there..  sea serpents in the 'canals' (streets)??

record.text:
The Ruby Dragon and I went sooo high and then SWOOPED down and VAPORIZED the canals with Dragon Fire!!

Those serpents were wriggling in the dry canals!

images.alt:
The screams of the villagers dissolve into the indifferent vastness. It is a reminder that we are all, ultimately, swallowed by forces we cannot comprehend. And so the sea serpents will themselves be swallowed by an incomprehensible force of nature 
2/2

images.alt:
The villagers, with their petty hopes and small routines, are being swept away by an ancient, primal force. The sea serpent is not a mere monster, but a manifestation of the universe's indifference to suffering. 
1/2

record.text:
The events of yesterday, the most beloved spring holiday, will not be forgotten. 

Silusa! @silusa.bsky.social I demand justice!

Your creatures not only devoured the entire Pantry Day Stew, they devoured several villagers! And sent the rest fleeing.

This terror must end.

HoC Silusa thanks you for your time, your valuable work means the world to her.

If you have any other questions or concerns, don’t hesitate to reach out and we can grab some time to sync up!

If you have any other questions or concerns, don’t hesitate to reach out and we can grab some time to sync up!

record.text:
The events of yesterday, the most beloved spring holiday, will not be forgotten. 

Silusa! @silusa.bsky.social I demand justice!

Your creatures not only devoured the entire Pantry Day Stew, they devoured several villagers! And sent the rest fleeing.

This terror must end.

Merv Astra and myself were unjustly imprismed by the Council for crimes we did not commit and by a vote with ballots that were spoiled. 

I formally request a re-vote and opportunity to speak to the Council to clear our names. I have brought @therubydragon.bsky.social whose ballots were spoiled!
